name: NeonX
description: The project is primarily about privacy and security of quality and fast payments between users. Freedom of speech and freedom of action of any person should be confidential at will. Also we are developing in the field of AI, the basic idea at the moment is based on changing images, as well as at the moment we are working on the gameplay developed on the engine UE5. Our team is very diverse and we try to try out as many features and innovations in this field as possible.
